answers.answer: Most that take the 3 hour test pass it but try not to worry just yet.
I have diabetes and it ***** because you have to change your diet. But it's not as bad as you think I promise

I failed my 1 hour test and passed my 3 hour. Gestational diabetes is very common. .. don't worry. You just have to cut out sugar and check your blood a few times a day if you have it. You and baby will be fine.  Some women that have gd get induced a little early due to having a big baby,  but not all do. Nothing to worry about momma!

question: My doctors nurse just called me and said my blood sugar is too high, and I need to do the 3 hour bloodtest, I'm nervous & so scared, I possibly have diabetes! What can this cause? Whats the worse that can happen? Will I be okay during labor and will my son?Im 31 weeks 2 days, I am terrified for these results. Tell me everything you girls know! :(
title: 3 hour bloodtest
